help.record: Click to start recording this conference
help.stopRecord: Click to stop the recording of this conference
help.mute: Click to mute everybody in this conference.
help.unmute: Click to unmute everybody in the conference.
help.lock: Click to lock this conference, preventing new users to join it.
help.unlock: Click to unlock this conference, allowing new users to join it.
help.deafUser: Click to disable the sound of the conference for this user
help.undeafUser: Click to enable the sound of the conference for this user
help.hangupUser: Kick this user from the conference
